definitions: the accumulation or increase of something over time, especially payments or benefits

examples.text: all debts must be frozen with no further accrual of interest
protein synthesis results in the accrual of muscle tissue
the numbers show a need to limit time-off accruals

definitions: a charge for work that has been done but not yet invoiced, for which provision is made at the end of a financial period

examples.text: before closing off an accounting period it is essential that provision is made for accruals

shortDefinitions: charge for work done but not yet invoiced
